text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now it's time for the Aoharu Hai to begin!

Aoharu Hai — another drama that runs parallel
to the Twinkle Series.
text_block_list.name: Monologue
Commentator
text_block_list.text:
A team competition organized by Tracen Academy!
Your team's strength will be tested even more
than your own abilities!
But this isn't just any race —!
text_block_list.name: Monologue
Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: The academy is in danger, and we must save it!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Does that mean that Urara and the 
others are going to be heroes?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: We can do it! Let's work together.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
Heh… If that's all it took to win,
nobody would struggle.

The tumultuous team story surrounding 
the Aoharu Hai begins now —!
text_block_list.name: Monologue

text_block_list.text:
The tumultuous team story surrounding 
the Aoharu Hai begins now —!
text_block_list.name: Monologue
